name: sno-utils
description: snoutils - 雪星实用组件库……TS中文函数式编程范式尝试，大部分功能尚在内测中
_type: module // type cannot be module as it will turn main.js into an esm but it should be an commonjs

scripts.patch: npm run check && npm version patch
scripts.minor: npm run check && npm version minor
scripts.major: npm run check && npm version major
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.check: npm run prettier && git add . && git commit -a -m format && tsc
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:babel && npm run build:rollup
scripts.test: cd test && npm i && npm test

author: snomiao@gmail.com
